This article describes integration of *Banksy* with two other packages used for
single-cell and spatial transcriptomic analyses, *Seurat* and *Giotto*. 

```{r setup, eval=F}
library(Banksy)

expr <- as.matrix(readRDS(system.file('/extdata/expression.rds', package = 'Banksy')))
locs <- readRDS(system.file('/extdata/locations.rds', package = 'Banksy'))
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = expr,
                     cell.locs = locs)
bank <- NormalizeBanksy(bank)
bank <- ComputeBanksy(bank)
bank <- ScaleBanksy(bank)
joint <- getBanksyMatrix(bank)
```
